import pymel.core
import pymel.core.general
import pymel.core.system
import os.path

def isLight(node):
        if isinstance(node, pymel.core.nodetypes.Light):
                return True
        relatives = pymel.core.general.listRelatives(node)
        if isinstance(relatives[0], pymel.core.nodetypes.Light):
                return True
        return False

def getTransform(node):
        if isinstance(node, pymel.core.nodetypes.Transform):
                return node
        else:
                relatives = pymel.core.general.listRelatives(node, parent=True)
                if len(relatives) == 0:
                        return None
                transform = PyNode(relatives[0])
                return transform

class AEbeastPassTemplate(pymel.core.ui.AETemplate):
        def __init__(self, nodeName):
                self.beginScrollLayout()
                self.addControl("passType", label="Pass Type", changeCommand=self.passChanged)
                self.beginLayout("Illumination Pass", collapse=0)
                self.addControl("illuminationPassMode", label="Illumination Mode")
                self.endLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Light Pass", collapse=0)
                self.addControl("lightPassType", label="Light Pass Type")
                self.callCustom(self.onLightsDisplayNew, self.onLightsDisplayUpdate, "lights")
                self.endLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Radiosity Normal Map Pass", collapse=0)
                self.addControl("rnmPassMode", label="Illumination Mode")
                self.addControl("rnmBasis", label="Basis", changeCommand=self.passChanged)
                self.addControl("rnmIncludeNormalComponent", label="Include Normal Component")
                self.addControl("rnmAllowNegative", label="Allow Negative")
                self.addControl("rnmCustomBasisVectors", label="RNM Custom Basis Vectors")
                self.endLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Ambient Occlusion Pass", collapse=0)
                self.addControl("aoMaxDistance", label="Max Distance")
                self.addControl("aoConeAngle", label="Cone Angle")
                self.addControl("aoContrast", label="Contrast")
                self.addControl("aoScale", label="Scale")
                self.addControl("aoDistribution", label="Sampling Distribution")
                self.addControl("aoSelfOcclusion", label="Self Occlusion")
                self.endLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Lua Pass", collapse=0)
                self.callCustom(self.createScriptFileSelector, self.createScriptFileSelector, "luaScript")
                self.endLayout()
                self.addExtraControls()
                self.endScrollLayout()
                
        def passChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                passType = node.passType.get()
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "illuminationPassMode", passType is not 1)
                self.dimLightPassCtrls(nodeName, node.passType.get() is not 2)
                self.dimRNMPassCtrls(nodeName, node.passType.get() is not 3)
                self.dimAOPassCtrls(nodeName, node.passType.get() is not 4)
                self.dimLuaPassCtrls(nodeName, node.passType.get() is not 5)

        def onLightsDisplayNew(self, attrStr):
                self.ctrls = []
                # create controls
                pymel.core.windows.setUITemplate("attributeEditorTemplate", pushTemplate=True)
                #self.ctrls.append(pymel.core.windows.frameLayout(label="Lights", collapse=0))
                pymel.core.windows.columnLayout(adjustableColumn=True)
                self.createLightsTextList()
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("..")
                #pymel.core.windows.setParent("..")
                pymel.core.windows.setUITemplate(popTemplate=True)
                self.onLightsDisplayUpdate(attrStr)

        def onLightsDisplayUpdate(self, attrStr):
                self.populateLightsList(attrStr)

        def populateLightsList(self, attrStr):
                self.lightsList.removeAll()
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                node = attr.node()
                for l in node.lights:
                        self.lightsList.append(l.get())
                self.lightsList.deleteKeyCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onRemoveLights, attrStr))
                self.addLightsButton.setCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onAddLights, attrStr))
                self.removeLightsButton.setCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onRemoveLights, attrStr))

        def createLightsTextList(self):
                self.lightsList = pymel.core.windows.textScrollList(allowMultiSelection=True, height=100)
                self.addLightsButton = pymel.core.windows.button(label="Add Selection")
                self.removeLightsButton = pymel.core.windows.button(label="Remove")

        def onRemoveLights(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                passNode = attr.node()
                selectedLights = self.lightsList.getSelectItem()
                for light in selectedLights:
                        for l in passNode.lights:
                                if light == l.get():
                                        l.remove()
                self.onLightsDisplayUpdate(attrStr)

        def onAddLights(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                passNode = attr.node()
                existingLights = []
                for l in passNode.lights:
                        existingLights.append(l.get())
                selection = pymel.core.general.ls(long=True, selection=True)
                for s in selection:
                        selectedNode = pymel.core.PyNode(s)
                        if not isLight(selectedNode):
                                continue
                        light = getTransform(selectedNode)
                        if light.shortName() not in existingLights:
                                passNode.lights[passNode.lights.numElements()].set(light.shortName())
                self.onLightsDisplayUpdate(attrStr)

        def createScriptFileSelector(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                node = attr.node()
                if hasattr(self, "scriptCtrl"):
                        pymel.core.windows.deleteUI(self.scriptCtrl)
                self.scriptCtrl = pymel.core.windows.textFieldButtonGrp(label="Script File", buttonLabel="Browse", text=node.luaScript.get(), editable=False, buttonCommand=pymel.core.windows.Callback(self.onPressScriptSelect, node))

        def onPressScriptSelect(self, node):
                filter = "Lua Script Files (*.lua)"
                templateDirectory = pymel.core.melGlobals['gBeastRoot'] + "/examples/data"
                scriptFile = pymel.core.system.fileDialog2(startingDirectory=templateDirectory, caption="Select Lua script file", fileFilter=filter, dialogStyle=2, fileMode=1)
                if scriptFile and len(scriptFile) > 0:
                        # Strip project directory
                        projectPath = pymel.core.system.Workspace.getPath()
                        absScriptPath = scriptFile[0]
                        relScriptPath = absScriptPath
                        try:
                                relScriptPath = os.path.relpath(relScriptPath, projectPath)
                        except:
                                pass
                        node.luaScript.set(relScriptPath)
                        self.scriptCtrl.setText(relScriptPath)

        def dimLightPassCtrls(self, nodeName, dim):
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "lightPassType", dim)
                # sanity check that ctrls are created
                if hasattr(self, "lightsList"):
                        self.lightsList.setEnable(not dim)
                        self.addLightsButton.setEnable(not dim)
                        self.removeLightsButton.setEnable(not dim)

        def dimRNMPassCtrls(self, nodeName, dim):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                basisType = node.rnmBasis.get()
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "rnmPassMode", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "rnmBasis", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "rnmAllowNegative", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "rnmIncludeNormalComponent", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "rnmCustomBasisVectors", dim or basisType is not 3)

        def dimAOPassCtrls(self, nodeName, dim):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "aoMaxDistance", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "aoConeAngle", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "aoContrast", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "aoScale", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "aoDistribution", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "aoSelfOcclusion", dim)
                        
        def dimLuaPassCtrls(self, nodeName, dim):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "luaScript", dim)
